person.persName: James Mathis (Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Mathis and Nancy Mathis. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Served in the 21st Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 30, 1861, to June 10, 1862. Discharged on account of disability on June 10, 1862. Served in the 30th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from February 19, 1864, to April 18, 1865.
